A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Dear hardcore Star Wars fan\,
F*$# off.
You just don't get it. Star Wars is an adventure story. It is as epic as an ewok and as complex as saving the princess in the tower. It is a children movie and it is not supposed to grow an adult as you. Instead of spending $200 in a shitty Kylo Ren helmet buy a dinner to your loved one\, take a course in writing and try to write a story and publish it\, and have it under the same scrutiny you applied to this movie. Disney doesn't care about your opinion on the plot\, they are busy doing something: entertaining us and making money in the process.

Dear hardcore Star Wars fan\, you are a Simpsons joke. The only true Star Wars fans\, are the children who are loving this movie. Shame on you for not growing up.
